name: The Castle On Hallohill
description:
unfinished rpgmaker mv game i was working on for a 2021 game jam. uses 3D environments and 624 x 624 sized character sprites. i was messing around with different ideas :p feel free to play this prototype if you like experimental rpgmaker concepts. i plan on remaking and finishing the game in the future in a different engine
P.S. The opening may take a second to load
